website_summaries.verdict: An efficient air bathtub that is the best pick if you want quality at a good price.
pros: The bathtub looks beautiful in all types of bathrooms
The air bubble feature is relaxing yet invigorating
cons: The drain doesn't release water quickly

website_summaries.verdict: Distances itself from others on our short list for its freestanding design. It will compliment any bathroom.
pros: Its freestanding design makes it practical for various bathroom designs, from traditional to contemporary
Owners commonly rave about its beauty
cons: Draining issues and a few leaks have been noted

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of this air tub given that it was way less expensive than the others I had seen. I’ve only used it once but I have no complaints. It has a colored light in the water that I didn’t know about. The air bubbles are awesome. The jets are noisy as expected. It’s not super deep, not sure how it compares to other freestanding tubs in the water depth. Fits one adult, wouldn’t fit two comfortably
customer_reviews.author: gb305

customer_reviews.title: We love it, very relaxing, worth running wires!
customer_reviews.text: We were replacing a jacuzzi tub with a soaker tube when we decided to upgrade to this option. Money well spent we are using this tub frequently and it is very comfortable and powerful for its size. We already had one dedicated circuit do to the previous tub wiring but did have to run power to ensure that the air pump and jet pump are running off of two separate circuits. The color changing LED lights are also a nice touch. We have been using it for 3 weeks only so we will update to see how it holds up over time but very impressed so far. One of the best purchases we have made for our home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tub and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this beautiful tub and with the amazing customer service and support I received. Our plumber created some problems for us while installing the tub. The guys at Woodbridge were very helpful and sent a new plumbing kit out for me on the very next day, free of charge! (Not once, but twice!). Thank you, Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Reed

customer_reviews.title: Pretty tub with excellent quality jets
customer_reviews.text: Nice tub but there was a crack/scratch about 6-7 inches on it. Due to the size, cost of hiring someone to install it, inconvenience of return shipping and good amazon customer service, we decided to keep it for now. The representative at amazon said we have one year to decide if we want to keep it based on the manufacturer warranty. (My concern is mold getting in the crack/scratch). Unsure if it’s easy to install as we hired someone to install it. Unsure about ease of cleaning the jets. We’ve only used the tub once since it was installed. It still looks very clean. The jets are very powerful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon9474

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can NOT apologize enough to Woodbridge, bc I was given bad information and the REAL issue we had was actually related to the standing faucet we purchased and a defective water line they sent us! Our bathtub is BEAUTIFUL and Chris Garcia at Woodbridge went ABOVE AND BEYOND to contact me and even help me find a replacement water line! He stayed on the phone with me for quite a while making sure I had all the help we needed!! Amazing customer service and I won’t hesitate to buy their products again bc I know they really care about their customers being happy & will go an extra mile to help!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Marlin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it hooked up and tried out the bubbles & jets. LOVE IT! Love the lights. Feels like a spa.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores

customer_reviews.title: Half the jets work
customer_reviews.text: I'm attempting to take my 2nd bath in this Woodbridge tub and the aerated bubbles (the air that comes out of the jets on the bottom of the tub) do not work. They worked fine on the first bath but now absolutely nothing! The jets on the sides and the light works.
customer_reviews.author: Merrick P.

customer_reviews.title: Sexy jacuzzi for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This tub is fantastic. Not only well made and good looking, but the jets work amazing, drains fast. You will not be dissapointed, just do your homework and get an electrician and plumber to secure this correctly.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: This tub is awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for your money. I am a contractor and I bought three so far.
customer_reviews.author: Barrington Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Love the look, and the tub, when it works properly!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the tub, but the hoses that hook up the air and water jets were not hooked up, unknown til it was installed... had to remove and hook up. They keep coming loose, we have fixed them 3 times, which is a huge pain- under house, removing drain and laying on its side inside the bathroom ! They’ve come loose again!!! So we will one more time tear it apart and try to figure out a way to attach them so they’ll stay connected this time !
customer_reviews.author: Scott Koger

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable work wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I have been in Gc for 30 years installed it at my client home six months ago they are very happy with the quality comfortable and look Easy to install I will recommended very highly
customer_reviews.author: yoram yehuda

customer_reviews.title: A great product to invest in!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great tub. Love the colors when the jets are running. Also, I had a minor issue and the customer service team resolved it promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Annie NeSmith

customer_reviews.title: The the drain to this tub is cheaply made and it causes leakage when ever the tub is in use.
customer_reviews.text: The tub is pretty but the housing is easily damaged and the drain assembly is poorly designed and cheaply produced. We have had the tub since 2018 and have only used it three times because of the drain leakage when the tub is full. I now have electrical problems that have come about because of the leak coming from the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie Sausser

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tub. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome awesome bathtub. Easy easy to install. Looks great great value for the money. Shipping was great...
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: Great tub.
customer_reviews.text: We love the soaker spa tub. It fits perfectly in my small space. Just wish I had more room for bigger one. Works wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: stacy

customer_reviews.title: Sent me two, both of them were cracked
customer_reviews.text: After having a bathroom remodel completed with this tub in mind, drains, measurements all correct, I can't seem to get this tub delivered without huge cracks in it. It may be a nice jacuzzi tub, but I will never know as I have had to return two of them.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gorham

customer_reviews.title: So happy to have it!
customer_reviews.text: After I done many researched I found this free standing tub ! And I can say I Love it ! Finally the remodeling is done and I was able to tried it , the jets are very strong and I like that , it seems very good quality too. For the price is a well-done product!
customer_reviews.author: Giulia iocchi

customer_reviews.title: Poor built quality
customer_reviews.text: I used it two time only and the tubes came off. It stopped working. Had to call service and pay $150. The fault is the air tubes that attach to the motors are not properly manufactured. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: valiant_buyer

customer_reviews.title: The tub worked. However, damaged in shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Product was damaged in shipping. However, I did not discover the damage until installation. Amazon would not accept a return. There was piece of protective foam around the top of the tub that hid the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Hunton

customer_reviews.title: Change in price
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, bought it 30 days ago for 1.400 and now it’s 998 for no reason
customer_reviews.author: Inés

customer_reviews.title: Relax , enjoy try not to fall asleep
customer_reviews.text: This tub has very good water and airflow. Nice and easy to clean and over very happy with but it’s only one month. The best Jaquzzi for the money in the market. Works as well as others that cost twice as much.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Anthony

customer_reviews.title: The quality of a product is very important.
customer_reviews.text: Great looking bathtub! My husband and I are enjoying it so far.😊
customer_reviews.author: Quality 4 U

customer_reviews.title: Need to contact seller
customer_reviews.text: We've had this tub for less than a year have probably used less than 5 times and the pump for the jets are no longer working unable to contact seller
customer_reviews.author: lina

customer_reviews.title: Buttons/ Motors don’t work after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: This hasn’t been used for even 6 months and both Motors won’t turn on when you push the buttons. Extremely disappointed .
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Jets failed in one year!
customer_reviews.text: After one year the jets stopped working, for the price I expected it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS TUB IS FANTASTIC!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tub is super therapeutic. It looks beautiful in our new home. Only reason I did not rate it a 5, the first week in use- a small rubber piece that sits in the air floor jet, came off and we aren't able to keep it affix to the jet. I'm not sure where to buy products for the tub.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod J Serrette

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after using twice
customer_reviews.text: Purchased at the end of August, installed in October. We moved in Nov 15 and used it twice between then and today. Tried to use it again today and tub does not power on at all. Unit has power, outlet has power. Line tested for power. New house! Still does not work. Now I need to pay someone to come here and figure out whats wrong with it? Looks good but seems like they use cheap parts if it stops working after being used twice!
customer_reviews.author: Nanci

customer_reviews.title: Product broke after a year
customer_reviews.text: Bad design of internal motor, bubblier is way too fast to sit in this tub, Then after a year and a half of owning this tub, the bubblier broke, doesn't work at all. Never happy with the tub, would not recommend buying it.
customer_reviews.author: knitter

customer_reviews.title: Great tub
customer_reviews.text: The tube looks great and is good quality. I had to use their support as the drain got damaged during installation and they were superb. Prompt response, easy to talk to and fast response.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Woodbridge b-0030/bts1606 67" x 32" Water Jetted and Air Bubble Freestanding Bathtub, BTS1606, B-0030 Whirlpool
product_meta.description: Color:B-0030 WhirlpoolExterior Size : 66 1/2" L x 31 7/8" W x 22 7/8" H ; Capacity: 60 Gallons; Max water depth (to overflow): 14" Power Requirements: 110 V, 60hz, 15A dedicated circuit 10 adjustable body massage jets, 10 whirlpool bubble bath jets, underwater mood lamp. Full fiberglass construction with acrylic topcoat for high durability and shine Double Walled Design. Formed with two layers of acrylic, bringing maximum insulation and keeping water at its desired temperature longer while soaking Wide, deep tub with a gentle slope that offers a more comfortable, leisurely soak. Big enough for a man, yet gracefully designed for a woman Chrome Integrated Overflow & Push Pop-up Drain included; Overflow and drain are pre-installed at factory Drain Location: Center Bonus: High quality flexible tube drain allows for easy installation to your existing plumbing Large freestanding soaking bathtub for full body immersion Hidden adjustable legs for perfect leveling with included flexible hose drain Glossy finish is resistant to dulling, scratching, and fading Pump with approved motor . Innovative technology enables this pump to provide a strong, steady level of hydro-massage; Power Requirements: 110 V, 60hz, 15A dedicated circuit. Certification: WOODBRIDGE Hydromassage bathtub is certified to UL1795, ASME A112. 19. 7/CSA B45. 10, CSA B45. 5/IAPMO Z124, CSA C22. 2 No. 218. Waranty: 5 years limited Waranty on the bathtub surface and structural. 1 year limited on the Pump , air Blower and plumbing parts Package: Thick carton Box with shrink wrapped on wooden pallet
feature_bullets: [ WHIRLPOOL & AIR BUBBLE]: Woodbridge Deluxe acrylic Freestanding bathtub with Whirlpool and Air Bubble Jets
[ JETS QTY ]: 10 adjustable body massage jets and 10 whirlpool bubble bath jets for maximum bather comfort, The perfect mix of air and water delivers a powerful, yet comfortable hydro massage.
[APPROVED PUMP]: Pump with approved motor. Innovative technology enables this pump to provide a strong, steady level of hydro-massage; Power Requirements: 110 V, 60hz, 15A dedicated circuit.

[ AIR MASSAGE ]: Gentle Air Massage, immerse yourself in thousands of tiny air bubbles, and relax to a soft tissue massage that aids in pain relief, muscle relaxation, and promotes oxygen and blood flow in your body.
[ SS MATERAIL JETS ]: Stainless Steel sanitary full-draining jets, underwater mood lamp. Spaciously designed to provide maximum bathing space with a wide and deep bathing well

[PREMIUM QUALITY CONSTRUCTION ]: Woodbridge bathtub is made out of 100% high gloss white LUCITE acrylic and reinforced with ASHLAND resin & fiberglass. All of these are top quality material which are rarely used by others due to a relatively high cost.

[CERTIFICATION & WARANTY]: WOODBRIDGE Hydromassage bathtub is certified to UL1795, ASME A112. 19. 7/CSA B45. 10, CSA B45. 5/IAPMO Z124, CSA C22. 2 No. 218. Complies with IPC, UPC, NPC. 5 years limited waranty on the bathtub surface and structural. 1 year limited on the plumbing parts, WOODBRIDGE US based product support team is happy to assist with any sales or product-oriented queries.

specifications.Included Components: BATHTUB, PUMB, AIR BLEW, DRAIN AND PIPE
specifications.Warranty Description: 5 years limited Warranty on the bathtub surface and structural. 1 year limited warranty on the Pump , air Blower and plumbing parts
specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.6 out of 5 stars42 ratings3.6 out of 5 stars
